title: How Many Calories in 1 Tsp Sugar?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 1tsp sugar, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per teaspoon, plus tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in 1 Tsp Sugar?
assumptions: Granulated white sugar, level teaspoon (≈4 g); no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, density (level vs. packed), and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of granulated sugar provides about 16 calories, all from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tsp of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 16 calories from 4 g of carbohydrates.
Yes, 1 tsp sugar is nearly 100% carbs (4 g), with 0 g protein or fat.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1 tsp?
faqs.a: About 4 g of sugars, equivalent to the full carb content.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have more calories than white?
faqs.a: Slightly—about 17 kcal per tsp due to molasses, vs. 16 kcal for white.

faqs.q: What if I use a heaping tsp of sugar?
faqs.a: A packed or heaping tsp can double to ~32 kcal; always level for accuracy.
